Dunlending lord Freca proposes a marital union between Hera and his son Wulf, which Helm loudly rejects. In a subsequent brawl between fathers, Helm unintentionally lands a fatal blow, so Wulf vows revenge and amasses an army led by General Targg. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gaia Wise, Brian Cox, Luke Pasqualino and Lorraine Ashbourne

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: After responding to an emergency call from a mysterious woman, a young locksmith gets unwittingly caught in the crosshairs of a ruthless mob boss. Thriller, starring Jonas Bloquet and Mustii. In French with English subtitles

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: A group of college friends reunites for a hiking trip in Sweden. When one of them is injured, they are forced to make a risky detour through a forest during a rainstorm, which leads them into the clutches of a menacing presence stalking the woods. Horror based on Adam Nevills novel, starring Rafe Spall and Robert James-Collier

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: The world is thrown into uproar when 12 alien spaceships arrive at locations around the globe. As tensions rise between nations and fear of the arrivals grows, a recently bereaved linguist is recruited by the US army to find a way to communicate with the aliens and discover why they have come. Sci-fi drama, starring Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner and Forest Whitaker

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster epic, starring John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Theatrical cut of Ridley Scotts sci-fi thriller, originally released in cinemas, starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: During a day trip to watch a theatre performance, terminally ill cancer patient Sam witnesses Earths terrifying first contact with the Death Angels - sightless creatures, which hunt by sound. Calmly resigned to her demise, she embarks on a lonely trek to Harlem to enjoy a final slice of pizza from the restaurant where her late father took her as a child. Horror prequel, starring Lupita Nyongo, Joseph Quinn and Alex Wolff

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: A courier transports information in a microchip in his brain. On his latest assignment, he is pursued by various criminal, militant and corporate factions who will kill to get the data - and he only has 24 hours to deliver it before it destroys his mind. Sci-fi thriller based on a William Gibson short story, starring Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren and Ice-T

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A teenager recovering from the suicide of a friend persuades a group of her classmates to join her in attempting to make contact with the dead girls spirit. They discover that she was driven to her death by dangerous supernatural forces, which they have unwittingly unleashed to prey on them. Horror, starring Olivia Cooke and Ana Coto

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: In the future, a company has extended human life with artificial organs - but they charge a hefty price, and those who do not make their payments can suffer fatal repossessions. One of the companys debt collectors starts to question his career when he ends up with a mechanical heart, and when he cannot pay, his own partner is sent to recover it. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jude Law and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: The Cinema List: Men In Black Films
programme.desc: A look at the blockbusting fantasy comedies, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones and more

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Theatrical cut of Ridley Scotts sci-fi thriller, originally released in cinemas, starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: A courier transports information in a microchip in his brain. On his latest assignment, he is pursued by various criminal, militant and corporate factions who will kill to get the data - and he only has 24 hours to deliver it before it destroys his mind. Sci-fi thriller based on a William Gibson short story, starring Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren and Ice-T

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: During a day trip to watch a theatre performance, terminally ill cancer patient Sam witnesses Earths terrifying first contact with the Death Angels - sightless creatures, which hunt by sound. Calmly resigned to her demise, she embarks on a lonely trek to Harlem to enjoy a final slice of pizza from the restaurant where her late father took her as a child. Horror prequel, starring Lupita Nyongo, Joseph Quinn and Alex Wolff

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As his behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoevens sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller

programme.title: Into the Deep
programme.desc: A young woman desperate for an escape meets a mysterious and attractive stranger, who promises a romantic trip. What follows, however, is deceit, mistrust and violence. Thriller, directed by Kate Cox and starring Ella-Rae Smith, Jessica Alexander and Matthew Daddario

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: After his daughter is murdered, a high school coach takes matters into his own hands and hunts down her killers. Action thriller, starring Dermot Mulroney, Jeff Fahey and Mauricio Mendoza

programme.title: Sharp Corner
programme.desc: Josh McCall is a family man who becomes obsessed with saving the lives of the car accident victims on the sharp corner in front of his house. Its an obsession that could cost him everything. Writer/director Jason Buxtons thriller, starring Ben Foster, Cobie Smulders and Gavin Drea

programme.title: Dead Shot
programme.desc: When a border ambush goes wrong, a retired Irish paramilitary witnesses the fatal shooting of his pregnant wife by an SAS officer. After outwitting the SAS, now wounded, and presumed dead, he escapes, taking his revenge to the dark and paranoid streets of 1970s London. Thriller, starring Aml Ameen, Colin Morgan, Mark Strong and Felicity Jones

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mothers new boyfriend. Thriller, starring Odeya Rush, Eric Dane, Saffron Burrows and Ray Liotta in one of his final films

programme.title: He Went That Way
programme.desc: Animal trainer Jim Goodwin unknowingly picks up a serial killer while on a road trip with his pet chimpanzee. Director Jeffrey Darlings crime drama, starring Zachary Quinto, Jacob Elordi and Troy Adams

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father, only to discover his shallow grave is now empty. Thriller, starring Daniel Portman, Brian Vernel and Paul Higgins

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: Colonel Katherine Powells mission to wipe out a terrorist cell in Kenya is complicated when a girl enters the blast radius of the intended drone strike. Powell has to decide between sacrificing the girls life or letting the terrorists flee to carry out more atrocities. Thriller, starring Helen Mirren, Alan Rickman and Aaron Paul

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Browns novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead mans revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancys novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

programme.title: He Went That Way
programme.desc: Animal trainer Jim Goodwin unknowingly picks up a serial killer while on a road trip with his pet chimpanzee. Director Jeffrey Darlings crime drama, starring Zachary Quinto, Jacob Elordi and Troy Adams

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: A Mexican cop-turned-mercenary is hired by a shadowy businessman to assassinate a politician. When he realises his employers have double-crossed him, he joins forces with a band of militant illegal immigrants to seek a suitably bloody revenge. Action thriller, starring Danny Trejo, Robert De Niro and Jessica Alba

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father, only to discover his shallow grave is now empty. Thriller, starring Daniel Portman, Brian Vernel and Paul Higgins

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Karen continues to fume over the divorce, while Grace decides to move in with Will and Jack - but their apartment is too small, so one of them has to go. Comedy, starring Eric McCormack and Debra Messing

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Ben and Darlene are excited to share their good news with the family, but Neville, Jackie, Aldo and Harris share some very similar news of their own

programme.title: The Conners
programme.sub-title: A Judge and a Priest Walk Into a Living Room...
programme.desc: The Conners gear up for a megawedding as Jackie and Neville, Darlene and Ben, and Harris and Aldo plan for a shared big day

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Samantha finally plucks up the courage to admit she has started dating Richard again, but does not receive the kind of support she had hoped for from her friends. Carrie becomes convinced she is going to get fired from her column when her editor tries to get in touch, and Steve tells Miranda he would like to have baby Brady christened

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: The girls join Richard on a trip to Atlantic City, where Charlotte receives a racy red-lipstick makeover and Carrie decides to take a gamble. Samantha is outraged to notice her lover is paying more attention to the well-endowed casino croupiers than her and realises she wants more out of their relationship than a few lavish gifts

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Marnie goes into control-freak mode while planning Hannahs 25th birthday party, while Adams eccentric sister Caroline turns up unannounced. Meanwhile, Ray struggles to keep his cool around Shoshanna as he settles into his new job of restaurant manager. Guest starring Gaby Hoffmann

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Hannah feels the pressure of her book deal as she is forced to come to terms with an untimely loss. Meanwhile, Jessa tracks down an old friend who she thought was dead and Marnie discovers a horrifying video Charlie has posted online. Starring Lena Dunham, Allison Williams, Zosia Mamet and Jemima Kirke

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: In an episode written by Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant, Michael discovers that one of his employees has a prison record, leading him to become Prison Mike and lock everyone in the conference room

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Karen tries to be supportive when Grace discovers she is competing against a high-profile designer for a job, while Jack enlists Wills help with his latest project. Guest starring Joan Collins

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Jack poses as a heterosexual as part of a bizarre scheme to woo a handsome man, while Graces new friendship with a neighbour leads to bitter recriminations. American sitcom, starring Eric McCormack, Debra Messing and Sean Hayes

Gregory Hines guest stars, with Eric McCormack, Debra Messing, Megan Mullally, Sean Hayes and Shelley Morrison

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Part two of two. Karens maid Rosario continues her quest to end her sham marriage, and Jack finally has to admit defeat. Grace drops a bombshell about her love life and it all proves too much for Will, prompting him to flee from his problems and begin afresh on a Caribbean island

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie is appalled to see a half-naked mock-up photo of herself on the proposed cover of her book, prompting Samantha to take serious action. programme.title: Jerrod Carmichael: Dont Be Gay
programme.desc: Carmichael performs stand-up set in New York, diving headfirst into his psyche fresh off his docuseries - Jerrod Carmichael Reality Show

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Live from New York, Jimmy Fallon brings his trademark charm as he hosts the Tonight Show, welcoming celebrities and musical stars to the stage

programme.title: And Just Like That

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Walshs script for Lost in the Clouds is unveiled, but his new interpretation of the source material leaves Dana Gordon fuming and Ari struggling to hold the project together. Eric starts his new job as Anna Fariss manager, but is forced to contend with the stars opinionated boyfriend. Kevin Connolly and Jeremy Piven star

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: A security threat at the airport jeopardises Vinces attendance at Medellins world premiere in Cannes. As Ari frantically searches for alternative transport, the gang is offered help from an unlikely source. Meanwhile, E continues to blur the line between business and pleasure with new client Anna Faris. Adrian Grenier and Kevin Connolly star

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: The fight between Selina and her rivals reaches its climax as their race comes to a historic finish. Final episode of the political satire

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Newly appointed US vice-president Selina Meyer tries to make her mark in Washington, DC by endorsing the Clean Jobs Commission - only to discover the perils of angering the powerful plastics lobby. She then gets further sidetracked when she is forced to attend a fundraising event in the Presidents place, and more interference from the White House leads to a hideous gaffe. The first episode of Armando Iannuccis political satire, starring Julia Louis-Dreyfus, with Tony Hale, Anna Chlumsky and Matt Walsh

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: Larry sets about covering his tracks after he accidentally causes the death of a country club member while playing golf, then kills the clubs mascot in an act of self-defence. Comedy, starring Larry David

programme.title: Historys Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: The tragic and chilling events that unfolded in 1692 in Salem, Massachusetts, plunging the small town into a frenzy of fear and suspicion. Accusations of witchcraft tore through Salem, leading to trials and executions that left an indelible mark on American history. Actor Laurence Fishburne explores how paranoia and superstition gripped the community, resulting in the wrongful accusations and tragic deaths of numerous individuals accused of practising witchcraft, kown now as the Salem Witch Trials

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: An investigation into the Roswell incident in 1947, when a UFO landed in the New Mexico desert. At the time, the US army claimed it had recovered a flying saucer, but this was quickly retracted and the item was declared to be a humble weather balloon. Experts examine the evidence still available to try to reach a conclusive answer as to whether the crashed object was from Earth or another planet

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts tells the story of Viking England by studying the history of York. She takes part in a Viking battle, meets the metal detectorists behind one of the UKs greatest archaeological finds and gets her hands on an almost 1,000-year-old poo. Aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson takes to the skies to see how the current layout of York reflects its history

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explores the Norman period of British history by examining events that occurred in Winchester, a historic town that still retains many hallmarks of the 11th and 12th centuries. To get a taste of this era, she attempts to storm a castle wearing chain mail, investigates the origins of modern surgery, and tries some eel pie. At the conclusion of the episode, cutting edge CGI is used to take the town back in time, and recreate how it would have looked during this period of British history

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts tells the story of the Regency period by studying the history of Cheltenham, Britains most Regency town. She attends a period society ball, investigates the rigid social hierarchy of the age and explores the Regency fondness for enemas. The penultimate episode of the series in which Alice Roberts studies one key period in history by delving into the secrets of a historic town that encapsulates the era, providing an accurate impression of what life was really like at key moments in the turbulent past

programme.title: Weird or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: A heart patient who underwent an uncanny transformation and a DNA test that revealed a mother was somehow unrelated to her four children. Plus, circles of ice appearing on lakes

programme.title: Weird or What? With William Shatner
programme.sub-title: The Hobbit, Limb Generation, Mind Over Matter
programme.desc: The possibility of future wars being fought using mind control and whether humans could ever regenerate their limbs. Plus, did man once share the Earth with hobbit-like creatures?

programme.title: Historys Greatest Mysteries
programme.sub-title: The Lost Fortune of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: The Knights Templars wealth and influence has long fascinated historians and treasure hunters alike, leading to countless legends and speculations about the location of their lost fortune

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: An examination of objects found on the Mary Rose and what they reveal about life on a Tudor ship. Plus, the battle-winning tactics of Admiral Nelson on HMS Victory

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: A look at the tactics employed to pass strategically important ships under the nose of the enemy, and the use of intelligence to carry out naval attacks

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: The CIAs ML-Ultra programme sought to create mind control methods through unethical human experimentation. Experts investigate classified documents that reveal the horrible atrocities that were carried out in the name of national security. Narrated by Jamie Theakston

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: Christ and the Crucifixion: The Real Evidence
programme.desc: A look at the historical evidence of Jesus’ crucifixion, from the realities behind the legend, to piecing together what is known for certain and what is missing. The programme highlights how little detail the Bible truly contains – including no reference to a cross – and the lack of archaeological evidence. Narrated by Jamie Theakston

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Investigations into whether ancient tales of beings with super-human powers could be inspired by extra- terrestrials who came to Earth in the past

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Investigations into inventor Nikola Teslas claims of communication with extraterrestrials on other planets and whether the scientist could have been a human receiver

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: The documentary concludes with a look at the sighting of a UFO by pilot Milton Torres in 1957, when he was sent to shoot down an unidentified aircraft over the UK. However, the object disappeared from his radar, and he was sworn to secrecy about the incident. Plus, other examples of fighter pilots encountering UFOs

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts tells the story of Tudor England by studying the history of Norwich, learning the harsh reality of religious intolerance, uncovering the origins of Norwich FCs iconic canary and experiencing humiliating Tudor justice. Aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson takes to the skies to see how the current layout reflects its history and, at the conclusion of the episode, cutting edge CGI is used to recreate how Norwich would have looked during this period of British history

programme.title: Historys Greatest Aircraft
programme.desc: The Republic P-47 Thunderbolt, a Second World War fighter aircraft produced by the American company Republic Aviation from 1941 until 1945. It was considered a successful high-altitude fighter and also served as the foremost US fighter-bomber in the ground-attack role

programme.title: Commando Missions
programme.desc: The Heraklion Operation, carried out in June 1942. Major Georges Berges team landed in Crete and moved across land, intending destroy Luftwaffe planes at Heraklion airfield. They destroyed about 20 Ju 88s, but despite escaping from the airfield found their retreat betrayed

programme.title: Commando Missions
programme.desc: Operation Frankton, of December 1942. The mission was for Royal Marines to place limpet mines on German ships in the occupied Bordeaux Harbour, 62 miles along the Gironde River. Five cockleshell canoes set off from submarine HMS Tuna at the mouth of the river. Only two reached the harbour and carried out the raid, escaping with the aid of the French Resistance. The damage to the ships and the resulting disruption to German supply lines had a significant impact on the war effort

programme.title: Bradley Walsh: Egypts Cosmic Code
programme.desc: The presenter dives deeper into Egypts mysteries, exploring the Great Sphinx and the underground Serapeum with its precision-cut granite sarcophagi, questioning their purpose and links to the pyramid enigma. Travelling south, he visits the intricately designed Dendera Temple, where hieroglyphs and imagery hint at possible extraterrestrial connections. He concludes at the sprawling Karnak temple complex, marvelling at its monumental engineering, sphinx-lined avenues, and Hatshepsuts towering obelisk - wondering whether its simply a monument or a channel for cosmic energy

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer inadvertently saves Springfield from the consequences of a nuclear meltdown and becomes a local hero, but soon starts to feel like a fraud and grows tired of everyone congratulating him. Featuring the guest voices of Magic Johnson and Jon Lovitz

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: An art robbery turns deadly, so the officers track down a familiar face - ex-con and art expert August March - in the hope he can lead them to the thieves. programme.title: Ryder Cup Memories
programme.desc: Luke Donald shares his memories of the remarkable 2012 Ryder Cup in Medinah, where the European team made a staggering comeback to win on the final day. The Americans went into the final day with a 10-6 lead, needing just 4.5 points from the 12 singles matches to win, but the Europeans won eight and tied one of the 12 singles matches to claim a famous 14.5-13.5 victory

programme.desc: Social affairs documentary examining the challenges facing young people today. This episode features Máirtín in Kerry, who reflects on his difficult journey growing up and the long road ahead. programme.title: Laochra Gael
programme.desc: The story of Sue Ramsbottom, who played senior football at just 12 years of age. Sue suffered heartbreak on the field time and time again, but in 2001 finally fulfilled her dream of winning an All Ireland medal. Six years after winning the All Ireland with her, Sues lifelong friend, Lulu Carroll died after a battle with cancer. After over 20 years at the top of her sport and a military career across the world, Sue, with her two daughters, is now back in her beloved home county, Laois

programme.title: Litir Ghrá on Dara Cogadh Domhanda
programme.desc: Documentary detailing how the love Belfast doctor Frank Murray had for his Gaeltacht sweetheart Eileen OKane prevailed despite the horrors of captivity in Japanese PoW camps during the Second World War. Frank and Eileen met in Donegal and years later he joined the British army as a medic and was deployed to Singapore. He and Eileen, a teacher, wrote extensively to each other and it is these letters and Franks journals that provide a remarkable insight into their lives. In Irish

programme.title: Ag Triall ar an Tobar
programme.desc: Irelands cities and towns are built by rivers, so its no surprise that there are holy wells to be found within them. Manchán Magan uncovers holy wells that have been sites of worship and prayer for centuries and are still visited today for those seeking comfort and peace. Here, Manchán visits holy wells in Dublin, Galway, Cork and Derry

programme.desc: This episode tells the stories of four horses much loved by Irish racing fans. Limestone Lad - bred, trained and owned by the Bowe family in Gathabawn. Danoli - regarded as the Peoples Champion - who was trained by Tom Foley near Bagnelstown in Carlow. Plus, Dorans Pride and Beef or Salmon - two horses who catapulted trainer Michael Hourigan into the racing limelight

programme.title: The Return of a Man Called Horse
programme.desc: A 19th-century English lord returns to the Sioux tribe he once lived among, and finds they have been driven from their sacred lands and have accepted their seemingly inevitable extinction. The lord rouses them from their passive ways with ancient rituals and inspires them to reclaim their lost territory. Period adventure sequel, with Richard Harris and Gale Sondergaard

programme.title: Hector Caribbean
programme.desc: Hector Ó hEochagáin lands on the island of Antigua. He checks out the West Indies cricket team as the prepare for the World Cup, joins in with the famous Hells Gate Steel Orchestra and lifts a stingray in the Caribbean Sea. Then its time to board his own yacht and make the trip to the Emerald Isle of the Caribbean, Montserrat. He takes an emotional trip to the exclusion zone of the Soufrière Hills volcano that erupted in 1995 causing widespread devastation. Hector ends up investigating the true Irishness of this island and uncovers a new truth about the slave trade there

programme.title: Cumasc: Seisiúin sa Black Gate
programme.sub-title: Olesya Zdorovetska, Ronán Ó Snodaigh and Myles OReilly
programme.desc: Three artists set forth on a journey of musical collaboration. Ronán Ó Snodaigh is a world-renowned Irish songwriter, composer, musician, and poet known for his revolutionary bodhrán playing style and being the frontman of Kíla. Myles OReilly is a musician and music-documentary filmmaker with a love for collaboration and experimentation. Joining them is Olesya Zdorovetska, a Ukrainian vocalist, musician, and composer whose work has been described as an emotional and intellectual explosion

programme.title: Call My Agent!

programme.title: Cúltír
programme.desc: Pauline Scanlon and Aoife Ní Bhriain celebrate the music and ancient culture of Fingal from the Irish Institute of Music and Song in Balbriggan. For Aoife, its a happy homecoming to her native county, as she performs with her father, legendary piper Mick OBrien. A lively night of music sees the great Leslie Dowdall join our hosts on-stage, while dance troupe ProdiJIG, rapper JyellowL and balladeers Sean Fitzgerald and Daragh Lynch head an eclectic line-up. Meanwhile, Aoife goes in search of Fingals ancient roots, meeting the countys famous Mummers along the way

programme.title: Dúiseacht

Meanwhile, 30 miles off the Shetlands, Charlie and Charles McBride brave the weather to repay their debts

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Father-and-son Charlie and Charles McBride have a disastrous week as they lose their fishing net and their boats hydraulic power is reduced. programme.title: Trawlermen

programme.title: Trawlermen

programme.desc: Tess struggles to run a department of work-to-rule nurses as football hooligans injure one of her staff and Abs tells Kelsey to finish on time. A graffiti artist falls from a bridge, causing a car crash that results in fatalities and serious injuries - and while the number of casualties leaves Tess with no option but to close the department because they are so busy, Greg feels so helpless at the scene of the accident he decides he wants to leave Holby altogether. Medical drama, starring Suzanne Packer, Kip Gamblin and Janine Mellor

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Suspicion falls on the father of a four-year-old boy who goes missing from his garden, but CCTV footage of the abduction tells a different story. Callum, visiting Sun Hill to discuss his suspension, follows the unfolding case and cannot resist chipping in with his opinion of the suspect, but it is solid work by his colleagues in the uniform branch that finally tracks the missing child to a storm drain beside the Thames, where rapidly rising water puts several lives in danger. Joel Beckett guest stars

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Shirley tries to prise Phil from Suzys clutches with the help of some festive karaoke, Janine resolves to turn over a new leaf, and Ian continues to be a Christmas curmudgeon

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Vinnies unexpected return leaves Shirley with a dilemma. Bianca tells Ricky that she will get the kids back without him and Jack discovers who has been dealing in the club

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: Marsha loses some of the nursery funds money, and attracts suspicion when the other mothers notice her son has an expensive new bike

programme.title: Monarch of the Glen
programme.desc: Curiosity gets the better of Archies girlfriend Justine, who arrives from London, only to discover he needs to lay a few old ghosts to rest in his Highland retreat. Meanwhile, Hector suspects Molly has a secret lover. Light-hearted drama, starring Richard Briers, Susan Hampshire, Alastair MacKenzie and Lorraine Pilkington

programme.title: Londons Burning
programme.desc: A drug war leads to a fire in a block of flats in a nearby estate. Meanwhile, Sicknote gives a public speech which leads to him receiving a standing ovation

programme.sub-title: The Afterthoughts of a Co-op Manager
programme.desc: Truly discovers a former suitor of Marinas went off to Australia, and convinces her the emigrant did so to forget about her - and that she should stop seeing Howard out of respect to the other mans memory. Long-running comedy series, starring Frank Thornton, Jean Fergusson and Robert Fyfe

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Auntie Wainwright is thrilled to have picked up a bargain at the auction rooms, but puzzled as to what the object is. Worse yet, when she does find out what her purchase is meant for, she still has no idea what to do with it. Long-running comedy series, starring Jean Alexander, Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton

programme.title: Signora Volpe
programme.desc: The return of the thriller series about a British spy-turned-detective who moves to Italy but is followed by trouble wherever she goes. When the police arrest Antonellas friend for the murder of a community leader, Sylvia follows a trail of blackmail, secrets and love to clear her friends name

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: UCOS looks into the murder of a private investigator who was stabbed through the heart in a suspected robbery gone wrong. The answers may lie with the victims last three cases, but itll take the whole teams expertise to crack the codes within his mysterious notebook. The movements of a rare stamp could hold the key to the investigation - if only UCOS could track it down. Meanwhile, Steve has problems when he rents out his flat

programme.desc: A teenager holds the key to an assassination plot having witnessed a murder. programme.desc: Part one of two. A year has passed and the women are reunited for their second case when former Bletchley Park colleague Alice Merren is sent to prison to await trial for the murder of a distinguished scientist. Jean is determined to prove the accused is innocent and calls in the team for assistance, but with the evidence stacked against her, Alice is quietly resigned to the fact she will hang for the crime. Starring Julie Graham, Anna Maxwell Martin, Rachael Stirling and Sophie Rundle, with Hattie Morahan and Paul McGann

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jack directs an operation to keep rival football fans apart, but ends up unwittingly channelling a group of them into a dangerous situation. In the ensuing clean-up, a body is discovered

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: Romance blossoms between Lieutenant Kate Butler and an officer from another unit. Meanwhile, Glory is not on the cards for Luke Roberts

programme.desc: A skeleton uncovered in the foundations of a swimming pool is identified as a young lottery winner named Cheryl, who was reported missing 17 years ago. The prime suspects are her fellow quiz team-mates, who won their lucky windfall as part of a syndicate, and while some have put their money to good use, the victims boyfriend has fallen on hard times and the media remain convinced he is the key to her murder. programme.desc: Harry is arrested after being framed as the mole who revealed classified information, and the head of MI5 orders his interrogation. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Aliya and Chris have lived in their unique home for 15 years of major milestones - they want to stay, but with only two bedrooms for five people, the house needs help

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Renee and her husband Dan had dreams of renovating their home together as they raised their daughter, Audrey, but Dan passed. The brothers step in to help

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to Swansea to meet 15-year-old Jack, who suffers from a rare form of muscular dystrophy that has led to a lifetime of painful operations. His mother Helen and older brother Daniel do all they can to help but as he grows it has become impossible to get him upstairs and now he has to sleep in the living room, leaving the rest of the family with nowhere to socialise. Having heard of their plight, the DIY SOS team turns up to transform their three-bedroom semi, backed up by an army of local tradespeople, with designer Gabrielle Blackman on hand to ensure they dont stray too far from her vision

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Aussie legend Curtis Stone returns for a slow cooked lamb and raviolo cook-along, which descends into chaos as a homemade ricotta derails some contestants multiple times

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Documentary charting the everyday work of paramedics with the West Midlands Ambulance Service. Medics respond to a case of gang violence

programme.title: Louis Theroux: Americas Most Dangerous Pets
programme.desc: The World Wildlife Fund claims there are now more tigers in captivity in America than there are living wild in the rest of the world. Armed with this statistic, Louis Theroux travels stateside to meet people who give house space to animals normally found in Africa and Asia, including big cats and dangerous primates. Among the owners he meets is Joe Exotic, a policeman-turned-animal rescuer who has bred and collected more than 150 tigers, and Connie Casey, who shares her home with her family of 20 chimpanzees

programme.title: Louis Theroux: Twilight of the Porn Stars
programme.desc: In 1997, Louis met adult-movie stars in Californias San Fernando Valley to explore the psychological effects of having sex in public and on film. Now he returns to discover an industry in crisis due to the deluge of free internet porn - and when he tries to catch up with some of the actors he finds one has fled, another has been sent to prison and a third has killed himself. He also talks to some of the new performers, asking how they cope in a business that offers less money, more insecurity and greater stress than ever before

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: A farmer is trapped under his rolled quad, backyard DIY ends in disaster, a teen experiences crippling abdominal pain, and a stroke patient needs urgent help

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: A crash on a high-powered motorbike leaves a man in a critical condition, a five-year-old fights an asthma attack, and a Waiheke woman suffers a scary cardiac event

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: The two finalists go head to head, each taking on the redesign of a trendy bar in Londons vibrant Soho district. They have three days to make over the ground-floor bar and an intimate basement cocktail lounge - and to help, both contestants have a fellow team-mate, plus a team of trades. One designer goes all-out, relocating the bar to the other side of the room - but the more they rip out, the more it becomes a demolition zone. Down the road, there is indecision and angst as the other finalist realises just how much is at stake. Who will win the career-defining contract to design an upmarket apartment on the Cornish coast?

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden purchases two dilapidated apartments nestled in the sun-kissed hills of rural Sicily, intending to raise them from their ruins and create luxury holiday homes. The hope is that she and workmate friend Alan Carr to make a huge profit they can donate to charity. After arriving at the crumbling property for the first time, the piles of rubbish and abandoned junk suggest to both that that this visit will be no holiday

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Two strong-willed first-time mothers give birth at Leeds General Infirmary. Alexandra is 25 and left her native Latvia in search of adventure. She believes her child is the missing piece in her life, even though the father is not around anymore. Surbhi is from a warrior Hindu caste and knows what she wants, while her husband will do anything to please her, especially as he feels responsible for a motorcycle accident that left his wife paralysed in one arm

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to Dartford to meet Scott and Jenny, whose third son Charlie was born with cerebral palsy and developmental delay. The boy needs round-the-clock care, which his mother gave up work to provide, but now he is 13, the family are struggling to cope in their small home. Having heard of their plight, the DIY SOS team turns up to transform their end terrace, backed up by an army of local tradespeople, with designer Naomi Cleaver on hand to ensure they dont stray too far from her vision

programme.title: First Responders

programme.title: Joe Wicks: Facing My Childhood
programme.desc: Joe Wicks goes on an emotional journey to discover how his parents mental health issues affected him as a child and the shocking scale of the problem today. Joe meets members of Our Time, the UKs only charity dedicated to working with children of parents with mental illness, and has honest and emotional conversations with his family that unearth long-suppressed memories

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr take on their first project - designing a Sicilian kitchen. Kicking off the demolition in 36-degree heat proves to be a trial for Alan, and he soon realises that taking on a build in a medieval hilltop town comes with its own unique challenges. With the help of Project Manager Scott, Amanda barters with the locals at a nearby marble factory as she bags a bargain for their feature island and brushes up on her culinary skills in Marsala, learning how to cook Sicilys signature dish

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his early 20th century Bradshaws Guide, Michael Portillo sets off on the first leg of a trip through Britains industrial heartlands in the footsteps of George V, beginning by travelling from Warrington to Preston

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Blackburn, Michael Portillo catches a rare glimpse of Edwardian life on celluloid and marvels at how factory workers and schoolchildren alike were drawn to seek fame on film. Continuing east to Nelson, Michael braves the enemy camp to have a pint of tea with the socialist working classes in Britains last Clarion House

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo visits Heaton Park in Manchester, where one of the first open air concerts was held in 1909, before travelling on to the town of Oldham. Michael then ventures to Edale in the Peak District, where he joins ramblers in walking country, and learns how a Sheffield socialist spearheaded a mass trespassing revolt to open up the countryside to working people

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo journeys from Maltby to Hinckley, investigating the high-octane sport of whippet racing and trying to understand the appeal of Marmite. Plus, he has a look around the Triumph motorcycle factory and learns about the first of these vehicles to be built

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek is picking up two expertly crafted batmobile replicas in the home counties and Dave cant control his enthusiasm for a Ford US wartime jeep

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul is picking up a stunning 1961 Vauxhall Cresta, inspired by American design, the car changed the face of British motoring

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: Documentary examining the rule of Adolf Hitler and his party, focusing on the Eastern Front during the Second World War, which many see as the defining arena of the conflict. In the autumn of 1940, Adolf Hitler has to decide what to do about the Soviet Union and its leader Joseph Stalin. He offers to carve up the post-war world in exchange for his fellow dictators support in the war against Britain, but is actually preparing an attack on the USSR

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: A US Army Air Force C47 that dropped paratroopers on D-Day is at the centre of one of the UKs most ambitious warbird rebuilds

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Ashton Court in Bristol, where they examine a piece of street art by Banksy in a local doorway. Expert Rupert Maas reveals the difficulty of valuing graffiti by an artist whose identity is a closely guarded secret. Other finds include a 19th-century automaton that can smoke a cigarette, a nautilus shell engraved with a picture of the citys suspension bridge, a globe clock that provides a surprise to its owner and a posset pot that may have origins closer to home than expected

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.sub-title: The Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art 3
programme.desc: The team visits the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art in Edinburgh, where Fiona Bruce gets a crash course in playing the bagpipes from a local boy. Finds include a distinctive piece of Swedish glass, a watch from an Edwardian motor race, an invitation to Sir Walter Scotts funeral, a chain of office with links to the citys trading heritage and a stuffed toy rabbit inspired by a series of childrens stories

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team buy one of Dereks favourite Austin commercials and convert it to electric, and also snap up a super-rare 50s American beach bike

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer with Simon Reeve

Simon then heads to Taiwan where he visits the typhoon-damaged central highlands and he concludes his trip in Hawaii, which he discovers may not be quite the paradise the tourist brochures claim

programme.desc: Will and Gus look to make some quick cash as they fix and wrap a Toyota MR2 MK2. Its quick and its cheap, but its the lowest spec out there and it looks dowdy

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his Bradshaws guide, Michael Portillo reaches Birmingham and discovers how a radical reformer made his mark on the city of a thousand trades. At Highbury Hall, he finds Joseph Chamberlains mansion home and hears how he established a political dynasty including a prime minister and a foreign secretary. Next stop is Cradley Heath, once one of five chain-making towns in the West Midlands. At the centre of Britains ceramic industry in Stoke-on-Trent, Michael visits Wedgwood, established by Queens Potter Josiah Wedgwood in 1759 and visited in 1913 by King George V and Queen Mary

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off on the first leg of a journey across Northern Ireland to Argyll and Bute. Beginning in Newry, he finds a specially chartered train that would deliver demonstrators campaigning for Irish Home Rule to a rally in the town. On the border between Northern Ireland and the Republic at Glaslough, Michael discovers a christening robe belonging to Sir Winston Churchill

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Belfast to Portrush, he investigates the work of author and Narnia creator CS Lewis and learns how religion influenced Lewiss work. Michael also visits the Royal Portrush Golf Club to find out how Irelands female population dominated the fairways at the time of his guide

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from Northern Ireland across the water to Scotland. Leaving from the seaport of Larne, he reaches Stranraer and the Mull of Galloway, where in a lighthouse built by railway engineer Robert Stevenson he discovers a magnificent machine, installed at the turn of the 20th-century

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek inspects a brace of old cop cars including a Rover P6 complete with radio, sirens and V8 engine, and a former Mod waves ciao to his collection of 1960s Italian scooters

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek swaps the office for rain-soaked Ripon to pick up a 1965 Ford Anglia with just 33,000 miles on the clock, while Daves loving the clean lines of a rare Renault Caravalle

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: In January 1942 the German army lost the battle for Moscow and a furious Hitler sacked or side-lined his leading generals and appointed himself commander-in-chief of the army. He decided on a bold new plan, focusing his forces on seizing the Soviet oil fields and taking the fuel to supply his own troops. Stalin unveiled his own plan to drive the Germans out of the Soviet Union by launching a huge offensive from Leningrad to the Black Sea. Georgy Zhukov warned him that the Red Army was in no shape to attack, but Stalin banished the former chief of the general staff to the front and took control

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: A team of engineers fight to return a veteran Westland Wessex helicopter to the skies - 30 years after its last flight

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return to Tredegar House near Newport. Among the finds are a locket that was a gift from Queen Victoria, a device used for creating tattoos, a classic car, a cigar cutter commemorating the opening of the Newport transporter bridge, 19th-century advertisements for public executions, a versatile tiara and a miniature font with a sad history

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Hillsborough Castle in Northern Ireland and Ashton Court in Bristol. programme.desc: The Cornish detectives silver wedding celebrations are interrupted by a fresh outbreak of crime on his patch. Five dead bodies have been found on board an abandoned lorry at the ferry terminal and a fugitive is on the run. Jack Shepherd, Helen Masters and Jimmy Yuill star

programme.title: Storage Hoarders
programme.desc: Aggie MacKenzie heads to Bath, Somerset, where she helps a man get rid of the hoard he has been paying to keep in storage for more than 30 years. Plus, a woman is pleasantly surprised by an old tea set

programme.title: The Salvage Squad
programme.desc: Brian Dowling and his fashion-forward design team continue their mission to prove to the nation that it is possible achieve a dream home renovation at little cost. Changing Rooms meets the Repair Shop with a new sustainable twist, the challenge here is to transform our bland old rooms, furniture and fittings into unique and stunning show stoppers, using only upcycling and sustainable methods. This is the home makeover format for the world we live in today, as two households per week, each with a team consisting of an interior designer and an up-cycling wiz, have just four days and 1,000 euro to renovate and rejuvenate a tired spaces in their home, filling them with home-made, re-used and revamped furnishings. Two families are selected from the same region each week and each has a tired room in need of renovation and re-imagining containing a potential treasure trove of up-cycling gems

A baffling suicide, an anguished father searching for his missing daughter and the smash-and-grab robbery of medieval artefacts throw the detective in at the deep end as he resumes his role with Oxford City Police following a four-month absence from duty. As the locals go to the polls in a closely fought by-election and a beauty contest builds to its conclusion, Endeavour must navigate the choppy waters of both worlds as his investigation shakes the highest pillars of Oxford society.
